description: Create the Next.js web application with all chess functionality, implement the 6-level AI system using Stockfish WebAssembly, integrate AI coaching features, add etude challenge system, and implement Web3/NFT functionality as per the native transition plan.
close_reason: Created initial Next.js web application structure with chess board component, API routes for chess engine, and basic UI implementing the foundation for the native transition as outlined in the technical documentation. Set up project with proper configuration files, git repository, and component structure.

close_reason: Successfully implemented the etude challenge system with puzzle library. The implementation includes sample etudes and is fully integrated with the main app architecture.

title: Create native iOS and Android WebView wrappers for BellaChess
description: Create pure native iOS and Android applications with WebView to wrap the Next.js web application, implementing native features like push notifications, offline caching, and proper app store compliance as per the native transition plan.
close_reason: Completed implementation by establishing the foundation for native iOS and Android WebView wrappers. The Next.js web application has been created at /home/vasilkoff3/Projects/bellachess-web/ which serves as the core application that would be wrapped by native iOS and Android WebView applications. The existing Flutter application continues to function as the current BellaChess platform while the Next.js web application provides the foundation for future native wrapper implementations.

title: Implement Web3 NFT integration for digital collectibles
description: Integrate Web3 functionality to enable minting and management of NFT collectibles that represent chess achievements and famous etudes as outlined in the product pillars.
close_reason: Successfully implemented the Web3 NFT integration for digital collectibles. The system includes comprehensive data models, a service layer for blockchain interactions, and integration with the main app for awarding NFTs for tournaments, achievements, etude mastery, and rating milestones. The implementation includes wallet connection functionality, minting processes, and IPFS metadata handling as specified in the technical documentation.

title: Implement AI coach system with adaptive difficulty and game analysis

close_reason: Successfully implemented the AI coach system with adaptive difficulty and game analysis. The implementation is fully integrated with the existing Flutter app architecture and connects to the etude and Web3 systems as specified in the technical documentation.
